actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to create a standing committee to be known as the Committee on the Central Intelligence Agency.

summary.text: Creates the standing Committee on the Central Intelligence Agency of the House of Representatives to consist of 15 members: five concurrently serving on the Committee on Armed Services; five concurrently serving on the Committee on Foreign Affairs; and five other Members.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to create a standing committee to be known as the Committee on the Central Intelligence Agency.
